name: PIZZA BAR & GAMES
description:
Life is like a video game. We live by learning and sharing knowledge. Pizza Bar & Games is like life, where you share your video game knowledge.

In this top-down game with quizzes, the players will test their video game knowledge with others.

Pizza Bar & Games was developed during Backtrace's Game Jam and is hosting on the Itch.io

Backtrace Project: https://nextouch.sp.backtrace.io/
